Oh my god... is THIS the pink dragoness?!!! She looks partially human... and naked with a um.. figure! You try not to stare at it...

You turn your head... your in some kind of exhibit-cell with fellow tourists staring at you!! Oh crap!! What just happened while you were out cold?

She just stares at you and tilts her head... she slightly growls.. glaring at you with a pair of sharp fangs sticking out of her mouth!

12421211.content:
You dont like that stare. Human, dragon, or whatever, that stare ALWAYS means something bad's up. And since she's staring toward YOUR direction, bad things are gonna happen to you! But what could be worse than being eaten alive and then spit up?

"Hmmmmm....." you hear her growl, "too bad. Too pitiful to even quench hunger..."
She spoke! The dragoness spoke!!
"Y-y-y-y-y..." you try to speak, but having trouble what with her towering over you while staring into your soul, "..y..you can t....t....talk?"

"Is it all that surprising?" the pink-scaled dragoness tilted her head.

"W...w..well..." you try to ask, "H...how come you didnt say anything earlier?" only to get a response with an amused chuckle!
"Heh!" her rather long neck stretched her head only inches away from yours, "And actually lower myself to starting a conversation with simple food? And terrible tasting at that!" Wow. You think she's insulting you. Referring to you as just food that tastes bad? You'd give this dragon-bitch a piece of your mind... if she couldnt simply open her mouth and bite your little head off!

Nonetheless, you try to plead with your new cellmate. "W...wait. I... I beg of you. Please dont hurt me. I mean you no harm!"
"And what kind of harm could you possibly do to me?" she interrupts with a sly grin... showing off those lovely fangs you came in contact with earlier!
Still, you continue, "I... I... is there any way out of this cage? Just tell me and I'll be glad to get out of your hair!"

Unfortunately, that kinda made her mad! "...If I knew that... WOULD I STILL BE IN HERE?!!" Before you could say a word, one hard swoop of her claw/hand slams you against the ground and pins you there! Major consequence for asking a stupid question.

"Now Im trapped here with a worthless cellmate," she growls as she stares down at you, "too weak to fight, too disgusting to eat, too tiny to mate with... what good use are you then, creature?" Oh man. Youre in an awfully bad position. The glare in that dragoness's eyes would make your soul wanna jump out of your body.

It seems she practically labeled you as worthless to her. Whether or not she'd kill you just because of that is questionable. But she has a strong grip on your small naked body! You closed your eyes and silently prayed it'd be over fast...

But just like magic, the angry expression quickly changed to an intrigued smile, "...Maybe youre not too stupid to get us out of here."
"Um...what?"
"You want out, dont you?" she asked you, "So do I. It just so happens there IS a way out of here... if youre willing to cooperate."
Better than dieing, so you decide to listen to what she has to say, "I'm listening."

"See that guard over there?" she ushered her head toward one of the men in zoo-keeper uniforms outside of the cage, "he's the one with the keys. I need you to get his attention. Then bring him over here and swipe the keys... while I have at least SOMETHING decent to snack on!"

Yikes. THAT'S how she plans on getting the both of you out?! Not only is it a huge risk (and there's NO guarantee she wont turn on you at any time!), but end up feeding another human being to the dragoness?! Can you actually bring yourself to do that.

"You want me to feed you that guard?! But that's...that's-"

THAT'S when you start to feel sharp claws digging closer to your body!! "You want out... or dont you?"
12421211.title: Pathetic creature.. (and it's not the dragon!)

1242121111.content:
As sorry as you feel for that poor guard now stirring in the dragoness' stomach, you have your own problems to deal with! Besides, what makes you think it wasnt HIM who knocked you out and tossed you in the cage?!

On the plus side, the dragon had the courtesy to take the guards clothes off before swallowing him. And being extremely terrified of being naked in front a colossal beast with sharp claws and teeth, you immediately put those on just before trying to open the lock to the cage...

"Will you hurry up already?!" your dragon 'friend' growled impatiently, "theyre going to sound the alarms any minute now!!"
"I'M TRYING!" you shout back to her as you constantly flip keys trying to pick the right one for the lock, "I dont know which key it is!"

"Would you like me to help refresh your memory?" she asks you as you felt her sharp claws running through the back of your hair! Despite feeling the nails rub way too close against your skin, you managed to find the right key. And with a quick click of the lock, the cage opens!

*BZZZTTT!!!* *BBZZZZTTT!!!* Just in time, too! They already sounded the alarm! But by that time, your dragon cellmate grabbed you by the collar of your newly aquired uniform and zipped out of the cage! With little flaps of her wings, you soon found yourself hovering off the ground and with each passing second you become further and further away from it.

She's flying up fly with poor little you in her grip! Of all the times to be stricken with a fear of heights... Too bad it's too late to try breaking free of the dragoness' grip because youre now over a hundred feet in the air. And you have a BAD feeling her grip on your collar isnt very strong.
...which is probably why she wrapped both her arms around your chest and waist...

"Well human... I guess you werent as useless as I expected you to be," she actually compliments you sorta, "After far too long, I'm finally free of that damned zoo..."
"N...No problem!" you try to speak as you stare down at the world below you in terror, "D...D....Does this mean you'll let me go now?"

She let out a harsh chuckle and you saw that same eerie grin on her face yet again, "So you can tell others about me?! Or where I went?! Absolutely not!"
"I..I..I wont tell anyone! I swear!"

"According to the sacred law, humans are not allowed to know of our existence. Therefor, to be absolutely certain you wont tell a soul... Im supposed to kill you." Something you wish you did not hear come out of her mouth! "And since we're very high... all I'd need to do is let go..."

Damn... after risking your life to save that damn creature, she's just gonna turn on you like this?! It looks like there's no other choice. You close your eyes and wait for your impending death... and hope to god you pass out before you hit the ground.

"But since you did such a generous favor for me, I think I'll just keep you as a hostage until the heat dies down," she said as you felt her nails dig into those clothes of yours, "and maybe as a little scratching post if I ever get bored!"

Whee. But better than death, probably. Wonder what else can make this lovely night even lovelier?

"W...What?! This is impossible!" your dragon captor seems to be a little uneasy, "I cant be lost. I remember the exact spot! So where is it?! WHERE IS IT?!"
"Where's what?" you ask.
"The Dragon Forest, you idiot!" she growled back at you, "My home! It's not here! I dont even see the others anywhere!" Though scared of looking down, you look down at the city below you... hundreds of houses, several buildings, a couple of freeways, you can barely even make out your own house from here. You dont remember seeing a forest there before.
Unless.... oh dear. You dont think...?

"I um..." you swallow hard, "I think they mightve built this city over the forest-"
"..WHAT?" NOT what she wanted to hear, "YOUR KIND DESTROYED OUR FOREST AND BUILT THESE DAMN BUILDINGS OVER IT?!!"
Great... ANOTHER habitat us humans stole! And dont think SHE'S gonna take this well. Her home's gone, her family's gone, her land's gone, and she has one of the creatures responsible in her claws.

The glare in her eyes and shine in her fangs gave you the chills as she looked down at you.
"I-I-I-I-I'M SORRY!" you scream, "I-I-I didnt know. I never knew that-that-"
"I know youre not one of the pitiful creatures responsible," she spoke eerily and calmly, although the glare never left her face, "but I'm feeling rather agitated at the moment. Care to fix that problem?"

"Uh...y...yeah sure!" you nod, "W..w..what do you want me to do? AAAHHH!!"
*SLAASSHHH!!*
With a hard swipe of her claws, she tore your uniforms to shreds!! You can see pieces of it fall slowly down to the earth below! Whatever was left was in rags, which wasnt much.

"I'm going to need you to hold still," the dragoness held you by the neck and cracked the fingers of her free hand/claw.
"W..what?"
"Are you deaf human?!" she shouted, "I said hold still! Surely, you didnt that many braincells from being airborne!"
Ugh.. youre getting really tired of her insults, but the combined fears of her claws, razor-sharp jaws, and a hundred foot freefall prevent you from speaking your mind to her!

"Why? What are you gonna do to me?" you ask.
"Im just going to test how fragile your delicate body is," she answered, not being very specific, "now hold still and take it like a man... or would you rather I do as you'd like me to and..." you felt her grip on your neck loosen... too much. "...LET YOU GO?!"

*******

124212111112.content:
[NOTE FROM AERODETH: ...fucking laptop crapping out on me...]

...Is that a smile you detect from the dragoness's face? Not a wicked smile like earlier (or a long while ago. Youre not sure how long you were out!) But actually a rather calming smile!

As if sensing your obvious curiosity toward your smile, she put a hand over her mouth and turned away from you! Perhaps she was showing more of her disrespect toward you ...However, now youre sensing she's really trying to hide her blushing!

"So...." the pink dragoness was still looking away as she spoke, "you recovered, have you?"
You look at the strange greenish scab folding on top of where the wound used to be. "Yeah. I'm guessing you did this, too?"

"Of course," she replied as smugly as ever, "couldnt have my little scratching post dying on me! Although, Im very impressed you managed to heal so quickly... I guess not all of your species are weak little jellyfish with bone-marrow!"
You ignored that little remark because youre more concered about where you are now. It's pretty dark, gloomy, and reaks of dirt, soil, and raw meat...

You slowly get up off the ground at stretch your arms a little, "Where are we?" you ask her, "where did you take us?"
"Dunno," she turned her head back to you and shrugged, "found this lovely and cozy cave over an hour ago while you were still asleep." An eerie grin appeared across her face when she continued, "turned out that the current homeowner of this place didnt take too kindly about uninvited company... so I dealt with him in kind!"

Her sharp-yet neatly trimmed-finger pointed toward the corpse of a grizzly bear! It's body was litterly torn in half as his guts and organic tissue were leaking blood and whatnot out of the opened space in the middle of it's severed torso!
"Oh my god.." you whispered to yourself as you stared in horror. Normally you'd be moments away from puking at that awful stench filling the air... but for some reason, it doesnt seem quite as nauseating as you expect. In fact, youre getting kinda hungry!

Nevertheless, perhaps it was a bad idea to let a creature of THIS magnitude out in the open! Youre terrified of your new dragon 'friend', but you made your bed and now you gotta lie in it.
"W....when are you gonna let me go?" you actually build up the courage to ask, hoping to god you didnt offend her!
Luckily, she didnt seem any more enraged then before.
"Relax, will ya?" she turned back toward you and looked straight in the eye, "once those mean ol' zookeepers stop chasing us, I'll let you go and you'll never EVER have to see me again!" she even smiled sweetly once more as she said it.

But before you could breathe a sigh of relief, she stepped REALLY close to you and looked down at you from just inches away as the smile turned into a grin. "But if you even THINK about leaving my sight while youre still my hostage... hmm... how do I say this in a way humans will understand? ..AH YES! ...Im going to stick THIS in your asshole!"
She pointed at her long spikey tail as it floated just above your shoulder!

"A...a....alright!" you nod in agreement, "I read you loud and clear!"
She lowered her tail away from you and backed away from you.
"Oh. By the way, it's time for breakfast," she tells you, "And look what Ive prepared for ya! Nice, yummy bear-torso!" she ushered her head over at that carcass in the corner, "The bottom half is yours. You may now dig in!"

EWWWW!! She wants you to eat that friggin corpse raw?!
"Uh...n...no thanks!" you shake your head, "Im uh... not hungry!"

BZZZZTT! Wrong answer!
"I...SAID... EAT!!!" she growled at you ferociously!
Oh god, that's just disgusting... but you dare not offend your captor! Besides... it doesnt really seem all that bad. Youre already getting used to the scent the bloody bear torso is giving off.
Ugh... youre not actually drooling over it, are you?! It's ROADKILL!! But why.... why would you actually.....

"Why would a fish jump in a net, just to be eaten?" you ask. It seems such a foolish thing to do.

"All animals depend on each other for food" said the mermaid. "fish eat other fish. A cow eats the grass, and you humans eat the cow...you humans eat pretty much everything"

"People don't eat bugs" you say.

"They do over in Asia" said the mermaid. "in fact, bugs are considered a..."

"But why would a fish want to be eaten?" you ask.

"It's called the great circle of life" said the mermaid. "it's also the law of nature; big eats little. When you die, your body will turn into fertizier to feed the plants...and an animal will eat the plants...so we are all connected"
"That maybe true" you say. "but, has a human ever came to you and ask for you to eat him...or her?"
"As a matter of fact, yes" said the mermaid. "about a month ago, this little girl came to me. The girl had terminal cancer...and she wanted me to end her misery by eating her...so I did" The mermaid said this without any remorse. Although, you could've sworn that you saw a tear leaking down the face of the mermaid.
12512211.title: Circle of Life

125122111.content:
Strangely enough... youre starting to feel a little compation toward the mermaid..

"Yikes... the poor girl.." you say..

"Why must I even care for a human?" she just turns her head, "She was just food. Food's personal problems do not concern me!"

You can tell she's obviously lieing... nevertheless, you cant let your guard down... youre still trapped in a stage with a humongous tank of water taking up 9/10ths of the room with a creature that considers your kind a delicacy!

The mermaid turns her head back and stares at you, "Well, since this is your last moments of life, you might as well know the name of your predator before you die."

"Um...what's your name?" you ask.

"Kati."

"Well, it was nice meeting you, Kati!" you tell her with a smile.

"Same to you... human!" she smiles back at you.

Just then... you hear a growl... it was the mermaid's stomach! It looks like youre too late.

She looks down and sighs, "I figured that janitor wouldnt be much of a meal... I hope the next one will be any better!" She starts staring at you..

"W..w..wait! Dont do this! I can find you others, and-"

"Sorry," she grabs you by the arms, "but it's what I do!" and pulls you into the water!!

She starts dragging you deeper and deeper in the water... youre starting to run out of air!!!
125122111.title: Circle of Death

choices: "Just a kiss of life! Nothing more!"
"It was the kiss of LOOOVEEE, baby!"
1251221111.content:
You struggle and try to break free of Kati... but her grip on you seems to be ten times stronger underwater than on land!! She continues to pull you deeper in... you start to running out of more and more air..

Having only about a minute left of air within your lungs left, you quickly think of a way to escape. However it's hard when you dont have much air going through your body!

Luckily, you remember seeing that one scene from the movie "Hook"... when Peter was pushed off the pirate ship and drowning underwater, those mermaids came, and gave him mouth-to-mouth from under the sea! The Kiss of Life!

Out of other options, you put your lips on Kati's mouth and give her a NICE long kiss, while sucking the air out of her mouth!! While the mermaid blushes from the little mouth-embrace, you push her off you and start swimming toward the surface! Normally, youre not a very good swimmer, but when your life is on the life, youre a goddamn olympic athlete!

SUCCESS!!! You reach the top!! You take a nice LOOOONNNGG deep breath, finally appreciating the air that you've left behind!

Just when you jump out of the pool, she emerges out of it! You quickly grab the knob of the locked exit in case she tries to pull you back in!

However, Kati's just staring at you strangely... she runs a finger through her lips and looks at it..

"Hmm..." she starts to grin, "...what exactly was that 'interesting' oral embrace you've just given me?!"
1251221111.title: A kiss to seal thy fate!

choices: She'd love to be with you
12512211112.content:
"Oral embrace? Mermaids must not have devloped kissing!" You think quickly.

"Uh, humans use that oral embrace to show that they, um, love each other..." You sputter quickly, still fearing Kati's hunger.

Kati tilts her head slightly to the side with a confused look on her face. "I didn't even know humans could love...I mean, you're only food..." She suddenly turns away, and you could almost swear you catch a glimpse of a blush forming as she turns.

"So...you love...me?" Katie asks, her voice quivering slightly.

"WHAT?!" You think to yourself. "I didn't mean it like that, but if it keeps me from being lunch, so be it!"

"Yes, my dear Katie... I fell in love with you the first time I saw you..." you say, letting go of the knob and moving slightly away from the door, trying to play it cool.
12512211112.title: Love?

125122111121.content:
You have said quite a mouthful. But anything to avoid getting in HER mouth! You have took a bold bold BOLD risk, confessing your love to a mermaid. Now you have to follow through it and hope for the best!

First, to add to gaining more of her trust, you actually step off the metal ground and actually back into the tank. You slowly and carefully put your legs back in the water and hop in. Bear in mind: as long as youre in the water, youre NOT safe. Nothing left to do but hope Kati has taken her mind off of eating you.

Judging by the way she continues to quiver in the water (so much that you can hear her seashell earrings chime!), and begins moving her eyes all over the place while blushing like crazy, she mustve been moved.
Out of instinct (whatever instinct it was will remain a mystery!), you actually swim a little closer to Kati...
Next thing you knew, her jade-green eyes locked on to yours... and she pounced!

"WWWAAHH-" *SSPPPLLLLAASSHH!* Kati pulled you back underneath the water and wrapped her arms tightly around you! Damn... you shoulda known it was too good to be true. I hate to say this, but GAME OVE-wait! Just before you could start gasping for air, she quickly pulled you back up to the surface!

She didnt drown you?! What the hell was that about?
The mermaid let go of you and began blushing, "Um... sorry," she apologized, "Im... uh... not used to expressing my true feelings. Especially to someone so forward..." then began smiling, "And cute! For a human, anyway!"

Heh! What do you know?! She was just being playful! In your face, Peter Pan!

Just then her smile turned into a frown. As if this just reminded her of something bad!
"Uh, what's wrong?" you ask.
"I... it's just... I havent met anyone treat me so kindly in a long time," another tear falls from her eye, "...not since, they kidnapped me."

You know damn who she's referring to. "...Youre a prisoner in this place?"
She nodded, "Almost a whole year before the day I ate that sick girl, I was swimming freely among the rest of my friends and family in the great sea of the Bermuda Triangle. Then... THEY came. Those... demons in fishing boats. They looked human, but were far too inhuman to be considered food!"

She lowered her head and stared at the fish tail swaying back and forth keeping her balanced, "They brought their nets, guns, harpoons, tranquilizers, and whatever other barbaric weapon they used to hunt us like prey. My family and friends got away... but...."
"You didnt," you finished her sentence. Kati wiped a tear from her cheek and shook her head. Geez... well, this IS a zoo and all. Chances are NONE of the animals were brought here on their own free will. But none of them bothered to open up to you as much as the mermaid did!

"You, human-"
"Please, call me [your name]," you insisted.

"Very well, [your name]. Youre a prisoner as well," she looked toward you, "they lured in here as a living meal for their 'star performer'. Youre a prisoner as well, arent you?"
You just turn your head and shrug, "...yes..."
She swam even closer to you and looked you right in the eyes, "We have to find a way out of here! We just gotta find someway to escape. There's no telling what they might do if they realize Im not finishing you off!"

But what can you do to escape? Doors are locked from the outside! Maybe there's a hidden switch somewhere in the room that could open a possible latch in the bottom of the tank. Then it'd be a long swim through the water system to get to the ocean.

That's just a theory, though! Besides, what if you get caught? The zoo-keepers could probably end up dropping in the shark's tank during feeding time next!
But... poor Kati... do you have the heart to tell her she'll never see her friends and family again?
125122111121.title: A prisoner. A lonely, lonely prisoner

choices: Empties the tank water into the ocean!
Combines all the fish into one large tank!
1251221111211.content:
Staring into Kati's deep blue eyes, you can't help but feel sorry for her. She's lost everything and everyone she's ever known, and for her newest love to say that all hope was lost was something you couldn't do to her.

"No, we're gonna get out of here! I promise you that!" You say dramatically, instantly bringing a shine of hope to Kati's tear stricken eyes.

"Oh, my love! Thank you!!" She says, crying with happiness as she embraces you tightly, the squeezing of her chest against yours making her breast squish on your chest.

Uh-oh. After all that talk, you better think of something, lest you break her already scarred heart. You quickly scan the room while allowing your mind to go over every possibility. "Crap! For a zoo this place is as tight as a prison!" You think, cursing at the level of security here. Hold on! A ZOO? That's it!!

"Kati! Do the keepers ever come in, to do like a show or something?" You ask, hoping that something this easy would work.

She lets go of you, and wipes a few more tears away. "Yes, but I get fed people after the live shows..."

Damn! That's a flop. You keep thinking about it, while Kati continues to answer your question.

"Well, but they do come in a bit after the feeding, to get rid of the victim's clothes, since I refuse to eat them...Oh no! They'll be coming soon! We've got to think of something!" She says, suddenly realizing the urgency of your situation.

Double damn! Time's winding down...A keeper will be coming any minute...Better think faster...WAIT! That's it!

"Kati! I have a plan!" You almost shout excitedly to Kati. You quickly whisper your plan to her, and she seems excited at the prospect of it. You both speedily get into position and wait for the keeper.

CLICK! CRREEAAKK! The hatch-like door opens slowly and loudly, and a man in a grey uniform with the zoo's symbol on it enters with a long pole with a hook on the end, which you assume is getting the clothes. He looks as if he'd been in an uncountable number of fights, and you sure wouldn't want to meet him in a dark alley.

The man looks around the tank, before asking in a gruff voice, "Alright fish, where are they?"

Kati surfaces in the sexiest way possible, coming up slowly and tossing her hair back as her torso breaks above the water, fully exposing her breasts to the world. "Why, what on earth are you talking about?" She asks, gazing at him in obviously lustful way.

A blush quickly forms on the mans face, and bulge in his pants. "Yes, it's working!" You think from your position on the far side of the metal entrance island. "All she has to do is get him a little bit further from the door..."

Despite his gruff apearance, this performance is obviously unnerving and making him nervous. "You, uh, k-k-know what I mean fish!" He tries to shout, failing due to his stammering. "The clothes, w-w-w-where are t-t-they?"

Kati swims a bit closer and pulls out your shirt from behind her back. "You mean these clothes?" She responds, with a bit eyelash fluttering. The man can only nod at this point. "You're going to have to get them from me!" She playfully says, with a wink, as she swims a bit further out.

The man doesn't even hesitate to step forward and start to take off his uniform as he prepares to chase the flirty mermaid. Too bad for him you'd snuck up behind him while he was hypnotized by Kati's playfulness. Using both of your hands in one hammer like blow to the head, you put him down. Despite his looks, he wasn't too tough. Or bright for that matter.

You strip him of his uniform, and throughly search it for anything you could use. While you're looking Kati comes over to the edge of the platform. Unnoticed by you her stomach lets out a growl. She looks at the knocked out guy and licks her lips in preperation...

Meanwhile, you find a garage door opener looking thing in the inside breast pocket, and you look up to show her what you found. You look just in time to see the mans legs slide into her mouth. Kati slurps them down like noodles and notices the look you're giving her. She gets an innocent look and her face and answers your unspoken question with a dainty burp and a response of "What? I was hungry..."

You can only sigh and shake your head at this. "Why'd I even look up? Oh yeah, I remember now." You show her the device. "Do you know what this is?"

"Hmm...I've seen the keepers use it for something...I just can't remember what..." She says, trying to remember.

"Well I'm gonna press it." You say, pressing the button.

BRRRIIIIINNNNNNGGGGG! BRRRRIIIIINNNNNNNGGGGG! A loud bell suddenly rings throughout the tank! Oh shit! What the hell'd that button do?!

"Oh, I remember what that does!" Kati says with a grin, happy she remembered in the nick time(according to Murphy's Law anyways...).

"That button...
1251221111211.title: NEVER press an unknown button...

12512211112111.content:
Ocean?! Cool! Talk about dumb luck! Looks like you'll escape this hellhole yet. You and your mermaid... uh... 'lover'. Yeah, but you'll cross THAT bridge when you get to it!
Right now the only important thing is freeing Kati and yourself from this place. And judging by the way the water in the tank is starting to sink, it seems to be working!

*BZZZT!* *BZZZT!* *BZZT!* *BZZT!* Oh crap! That wasnt the bell you were hearing earlier! That was an alarm. And judging by the way the entire room's flashing red, it's a good alarm! Even worse, you think you can hear sounds of heavy marching starting to get louder and louder...
"Aw great..." you groan, "guess theyre on to us now!"

"C'mon then!" Kati ushered you back in the water, "let's go already!" Unfortunately, youre a little hesitant. Not because youre scared of going on a death-defying swim to escape cutthroat zoo-keepers... but because you dont wanna do it without any clothes on!
"Uh.. can I at least put my clothes back on first?" you ask the mermaid who still has your pants and shirt gripped in the palm of her bluish hand.
"Worry about that later!" Kati shouted just before grabbing your arm tight and pulling you back in the water! Too bad you didnt get enough time to take a deep breath!

Luckily, just with gentle flicks of her tail, she swims at an incredibly fast speed! You could almost hear the thunderous sounds of her trying to break the sound barrier, only more bubbly. And she just gorged herself on a huge hulking man about twice your size. Apparently, despite that little bulge in her belly, it doesnt seem to weigh her down!

"How are you holding up?" Kati turned her head and asked you... suprisingly very clear! The water doesnt distraught her voice.
"Blaugh gobba be doth ine!" but it distraughts yours.
"Oh yeah! Heh! Sorry!" Kati apologized, remembering a certain human flaw You'd shrug from that stupid joke... but you cant spare the air.

It isnt too long a swim in the blinding sea... soon, Kati shifts her tail straight downwards, causing her to swim upwards toward the surface. That must mean youre finally out of that zoo. Sweet!
*SPPPLLLAAASSHHH!!!*
Ah! Air! You can breath again! Not only that, but you are no longer at that damn zoo. Youre surrounded by water and the only bit of land in sight is quite a ways away. You can still make out that one certain place you escaped from... Welcome to the ocean!

...Just then, the certain begins to move farther and farther away from your field of vision. No, wait. Actually, Kati still seems to be dragging you off by your hand! Where is she taking you?
"Uh... Kati, what are you doing?" you ask her, "we're already out of that place."
"We're going home," she answered with a smile, "back home...."

'Home'? HER home?! "W w w wait!" you try to stop her, "I already have a home. It's back on land."
"We cant leave each other like this, my love!" she tried to explain, "we have to go.. together. And I cant live on land."
"But what about me? I-"
"You can swim, right?" the mermaid interrupted.
"Well, yeah, but..."

"Good," she interrupted again and still dragged you by the arm, "besides, I still have a certain duty to fill... as princess of the merpeople."
...PRINCESS?! That creature you met in that crooked tourist trap, who tried to eat you, fell in love with you, and escaped along with... is a princess?
"Wh...WHAT?!" you shout in suprise, "you... you never told me you were a princess!"
"You didnt ask," was all Kati responded. Oh wonderful. Now you have quite a weight on your shoulders. The princess of a hidden species of predators to your kind is gonna take you to her 'glorious' kingdom! Might as well have been back in that zoo.. you only had ONE predator to deal with!

"It might be hard explaining this to my mom, the queen," Kati could almost read your mind,"but Im sure she'll be glad to accept you, seeing as though you rescued me from that horrible place..." she smiled a little and spouted, "...my hero!"

This is gonna be tough. On one hand, you'd get to explore a mysterious lost kingdom of beings that are only thought of as rumors... AND you snagged yourself a princess! On the OTHER hand... you miss home. Would you ever see it again? You heard rumors that no one who crosses into the Bermuda Triangle leaves... and it looks like you found out why.
12512211112111.title: "Excuse me, are you a PRINCESS?"

choices: Meet the Queen, maybe get lucky
125122111121112.content:
Regardless of the risks, you just can't pass up once in a life--no, a once in a HUNDRED lifetime chance to see an underwater utopia! And the risk of being eaten, psh, every adventure has to have some danger! Indiana Jones would be nothing without his boulder!

"Well, I'll be there to help you explain it." You say, and give her a wink and a reassuring smile. "Don't worry, it'll be fine!" If you weren't so excited from breaking out of a "prison" and almost drowning surely you'd be wondering where your confidence suddenly appeared from...

With tears welling in her eyes Kati embraces you tightly, almost suffocating you with her hug of joy. "Thank you!" She says happily, releasing you(AIR! SWEET SWEET AIR) to look you in the face. "You don't know how much this means to me!" She says, once again tears welling as she hugs you again, albeit, less tightly.

As you two embrace in the warm ocean water, something suddenly occurs to you. "Um, Kati?" You hesitantly ask. She only sniffles a bit in response. "Uh, if we can still see the zoo and they know we escaped, shouldn't we be...uh, leaving?"

Kati seems to instantly stop crying and straighten up, as if something just hit her full force in the head. "Oh, my, you're right! I'd completely forgotten!" She says as the panic starts to set in. "Come on, we have to get a move on!" She grabs both your arms and wraps them around her waist franctically, as if the keepers were right on your tails, which they could quite possibly be.

In a slight state of shock you watch as your hands are wrapped around her waist and you are slightly roughly pulled onto her back, before realizing you should probably ask what's going on.

"Uh, Kati? What are you doing?" You ask, mind still spinning slightly. "What'd you mean? We have to go!" She says, firmly but gently at the same time. "I mean, with my hands, and me on your back like this..." You say, a blush forming on your face. "Well, if I pulled you like before I might rip your arm off, basically. My home isn't that far, but it's going to be a while before we arrive, and I thought this would be more enjoyable for both of us." She says with a giggle. "Now, hold tight!"

She gently flicks her tail and the two of you speed off through the water! You can't see much with all the water splashing up in your face, so you just close your eyes and lay your head down on your lovers back as she gently rocks up and down from her speedy swimming. In no time at all you're falling asleep to the sunset, the gentle rocking and the sound of the water.

*YAWN* You yawn and stretch a bit in bed as you awoke "What a dream...man eating mermaid that loved me, ha..." You grogily say as you roll over, and get a close up of a sleeping Kati! "Ah!" That was no dream, that actually happened! Kati stirs a bit from your...manly yelp...and sleepily opens her eyes, although they look slightly glazed, as if she's still sleeping. "Mmm, honey, you up? It's still early..." She says with a cute yawn. "Lets sleep for a while longer..." As she cuddles up with you, you realize it'd be best if you slept a while longer, you two could use the rest...

"Mhmm, you're so soft to cuddle with...HUH?" You suddenly say, surprised at your own cluelessness. "What is it?" Kati says sitting up in the bed, slightly alarmed. "If I'm cuddling with you...we must be...uh, dear, where are we?" You rather nervously ask your mermaid lover. "We're at home," She replies casually,"My room to be exact."

Sure enough, as you look at the bed you're pretty sure it isn't yours. You didn't have a double king-sized bed with head and foot-boards that matched the decor of the room. Hell, your headboard and foot board don't even match each other! And last you checked, your bed also didn't have the word "Kati" written in pearls on the headboard. After taking your eyes off of the black and white patterned bed, you look around the room and see various girly things: a vanity mirror, a few dressers, (although, since you haven't seen Kati wear any clothes, what's in there is beyond you), a few stuffed animals (stuffed fish animals actually), and some makeup. You start thinking about how makeup would work underwater when it finally hits you: You're in Kati's room, which means you're underwater!

WHAT?! Oh no, I can't breathe!! AHH!!!
...
...?
"Huh? I can...breathe?" You ask, obviously dumbfounded. "Of course silly!" Kati says with a playful giggle. "What, do you think I'd take you somewhere you can't survive?" Your nervous chuckle goes either unnoticed or ignored by Kati, who continues, "The scientists on the boat that captured me were also running tests on the water of this area. They said the oxygen is concentrated enough here for even a human to be able to breathe in it." She finishes up her explanation with a quick kiss on the lips. "Well, since we're up, what'd you wanna do? We could go meet with my mother or..." at this you notice a slight shade of red on her cheeks, "we could do something...else..."

So, another choice looms before you, our hero(/ine). Are you gonna wow the Queen, and convince her you aren't on the menu, but rather her future son-in-law, or are you gonna wow Kati with some things off your "menu"?
125122111121112.title: Go figure, an underwater city with oxygen!

1251221111211121.content:
Oh, you'd want to! No friggin second-questioning it! How could you possibly turn down such a generous offer from the Princess?!
However, if you DID, that little angel on your right shoulder would be nagging you all day! You arent married to her and all that jazz... besides, what if one of those merservants were to barge in? Potential food riding their fair Princess? That could lead to BAD things! Perhaps if you had a chat with the mighty queen, Kati will explain what youve done for her, and you might be accepted into the royal family! ...Then you can fuck her guilt-free! :D

"I'd love to," you tell Kati, "but maybe it'd be best to break the news to your mother. She's probably worried sick about you." Kati nods her head and slips out of the luxurious bed, "Youre right. C'mon!" and with that, she grabbed you by your hand and pulled you right off the bed before you could even try to resist, "Let's go tell mother the good news!"

No point in protesting, since she's obviously very strong and you wouldve done this willingly. You try to keep up with her pace to make it seem like she isnt dragging you, but her fish tail is going at an even faster pace than your feet can handle!

The door leads to the outside of the tower with a long walkway toward several domes high atop the palace. At least you get a lovely view of the underwater paradise. Little coral houses can be seen in the horizon, huge sand mountains, porcelain and marble ground pave the streets, a few sunken ships possibly made into little casinos judging by the flashy lights and the loud musics, and of course the hundreds of merpeople swimming around and socializing with one another! THIS... IS... CIVILIZATION!

Too bad you get long to admire the sights, because after a short while of walking, Kati stops (so YOU stop) in front of another one of the separate dome rooms. With a turn of the knob, you and the princess enter...

Golden EVERYTHING! The walls, the dresser, the ceiling fan, the picture frames hung on the walls, little golden figurines on a gold table, and the bed... is white. White with word 'UNDINE' marked on the blanket. Each letter encrusted in jewels. According to the huge bulge under the covers, someone's fast asleep.

"MOTHER!!!!" Kati shouted, "WAKE UP! IT'S ME!!" She removed the covers, revealing the other blueish mermaid underneath. She had sandy brown hair and jade eyes like Kati, but looked rather older. Though there werent many wrinkles on her face... in fact, you could still see the hint of youth on her lovely face... as well as the rest of her body (not counting the fish-tail!) Her stomach looked flat and slightly ripped while her well-rounded breasts still kept in place despite her necklace with a little locket dangling in between them!

"..Huh?" the mermaid tilted her head as she stared at Kati, "....!! Kati? KATI!! Oh thank God!" she hugged her daughter and shedded a tear, "Thank God! I thought those creatures had you for good! How did you manage to escape them?"
"It was thanks to this human, I-"
That's when Kati's mom started staring at you. Only not as friendly-like. In fact judging by the glare, more like hostile-like! "You... a human?! Take your hands off my daughter!! GUARDS!!"

Figures. Luckily, Kati wrapped her arms around you in your defense, "Wait, mother! This human saved me! (your name) was the one that helped me out of that horrible place. He rescued me!"
The hostile look faded from her mother's face, "..Is that true, human? You saved my daughter?"
"Well... yes uh... your majesty," you try to show your respect to royalty, "I aided in freeing Princess Kati of that-WAAH!"

"Thank you, human!" before you could finish your sentence, the queen grabbed you and squeezed you in between her giving you a nice closeup of her.... locket! "You have my deepest gratitude! EVERYONE! COME QUICK! THE PRINCESS IS BACK! THE PRINCESS IS BACK!" It didnt take long before several mermaids and mermen barged into the room via their queen's command!

Each one had a different color. A red one, green one, orange one, black one, purple, etc. All of them bowing to the queen in unison. "My people... Princess Kati has returned!" the queen announced, "We owe it all to this human stranger!" Normally, you'd say something at this point, but youre still crammed in your majesty's cleavage because she STILL didnt let go of you!

"This is wonderful news, my lady!" you overheard a familiar voice call out, "After a year or so, the daughter of Queen Undine has returned!"
You cant turn your head to look at him, because Undine just will not let you go for some reason! "Oh.. Chancellor Juno. You've arrive just in time to hear the news!"

"I have heard, your majesty!" you listen to him as you try to move your head out of the uh...'spot', "And you human, on behalf of the entire kingdom, we owe you quite a debt we cannot repay." After a little while of moving around against the 'cushions', you finally managed to position your head to where you can see Juno...

...not only does he sound familiar, he LOOKS familiar! Grey skin, black hair, blue eyes, tattoo on his cheek... hmm..

************
"I suggest you check out the fish exhibit or the bird exhibit first... they have some INTERESTING creatures there....there...there.....ere.....re.....e........"
************

THE CASHIER FROM THE GIFT SHOP! HE was the one that got you in this mess in the first place! If he's with the merpeople, why the hell was he working at the zoo?!

You gotta tell the queen! Undine's got a traitor that helped abduct her daughter working under her!
But then again... why should they believe you? Youre still a stranger... Juno happens to be their Chancellor. If they dont believe you, that'll only make you look stupid!

....Sneaky little a-hole!
1251221111211121.title: Nice locket you have there, your majesty!

125122111122.content:
You have said quite a mouthful. But anything to avoid getting in HER mouth! You have took a bold bold BOLD risk, confessing your love to a mermaid. Now you have to follow through it and hope for the best!

First, to add to gaining more of her trust, you actually step off the metal ground and actually back into the tank. You slowly and carefully put your legs back in the water and hop in. Bear in mind: as long as youre in the water, youre NOT safe. Nothing left to do but hope Kati has taken her mind off of eating you.

She actually swam even closer to you... very close! She was even pressing her boobs against your chest and breathing down your neck.
"Well then..." Kati smiles, "it is official. We must mate!"
MATE?! ALLREADY?! "M..m...mate?! N..n...now?!"
"Of course!" the mermaid continued to smile, "where I come from, when one expresses their true feelings towards another, and that feeing is returned, they are required to mate immediately to ensure that their love is sacred!"

..Wow! How about that? And since youre not the type of person to break tradition, you more than happily comply. Although it might be a little odd doing it with someone that's kinda part-fish... but what the hell? Might make for a 'unique' experience!

"Now please take your clothes off," she politely tells you, "Id perfer you to engage me in your natural."
You just nod, "Ok!" and immediately pull off your shirt. Then you unzip your pants, slide them off, drop your boxers, then toss your clothes in front of the door!
"Good..." you can start to feel her scaley bottom half rub against your... *AHEM!* "Now would you mind closing your eyes?," Kati asked as she slowly dived into the water, "I want this to be a... 'surprise'!"
